mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_NAME, u.USER_PHONE, u.USER_WX_NUMBER, u.USER_SN, u.USER_SEX, u.USER_BALANCE, ai.AGENT_PK, ai.COMPANY_NAME, ai.BUSINESS_LICENSE, ai.COMPANY_ADDRESS, ai.AUTH_STATUS, ai.AGENT_LEVEL, ai.AGENT_AREA FROM sc_user u LEFT JOIN sc_agent_info ai ON ai.USER_FK = u.USER_PK WHERE u.USER_PK = #{USER_ID};
mapper.insert: UPDATE sc_agent_info SET COMPANY_NAME = #{COMPANY_NAME}, BUSINESS_LICENSE = #{BUSINESS_LICENSE}, COMPANY_ADDRESS = #{COMPANY_ADDRESS}, AGENT_AREA = #{AGENT_AREA}, UPDATE_TIME = NOW(), UPDATE_BY = #{UPDATE_BY} WHERE USER_FK = #{USER_ID};
mapper.update: UPDATE sc_user SET USER_NAME = #{USER_NAME}, USER_PHONE = #{USER_PHONE},USER_SEX = #{USER_SEX}, USER_WX_NUMBER = #{USER_WX_NUMBER}, UPDATE_TIME = NOW(), UPDATE_BY = #{UPDATE_BY} WHERE USER_PK = #{USER_ID};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sc_agent_info ( AGENT_PK, USER_FK, COMPANY_NAME, BUSINESS_LICENSE, COMPANY_ADDRESS, AGENT_AREA, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY ) VALUES ( #{UUID}, #{USER_ID}, #{COMPANY_NAME}, #{BUSINESS_LICENSE}, #{COMPANY_ADDRESS}, #{AGENT_AREA}, NOW(), #{CREATE_BY} )
